News & Media Member Login REGISTER HERE Give Search for: Contact 2025-08-25T10:48:20-06:00 Contact Us Lakeland Hills YMCA is community-centered, bringing people of all ages and backgrounds together, to nurture potential and mobilize local communities to effect lasting and meaningful change. We look forward to helping you with your needs and answering any questions you may have. Feel free to contact us via the form below or through a membership representative at one of our local YMCAs. Contact Us Form × Contact Lakeland Hills Family Y Name * First Last Email * Who do you want to contact? * President and Chief Executive Officer, Alex Martinez Fund Development Associate, Dante Gonzalez Health & Wellness Director, Kelly Najjar Assistant Camp and Program Director, Quentin Pickering Camp & Youth Program Director, Linnea Berry Website Manager, Carmen Fritsch HR Director, Renee Dorn Chief Operating Officer, Devon Maloney Assistant Aquatics Director & Swim Lesson Coordinator, Yash Kothari Controller, Gail Shelby Fitness Director, Gerry Gessie Member Services Coordinator, Hope Hornick IT Director, Jonathan Ogintz Aquatics Manager/Lifeguard Coordinator, Sydney Jasinski Vice President Fund Development, Kaite Burke Community Engagement Manager, Kelly Horvath Early Childhood Learning Center Director, Michele Leaman Buildings and Grounds Assistant Director, Mika Newman Buildings and Grounds Director, Mike Ambrosi Membership Administrator/Day Camp Bookkeeper, Nancy Dunham Member Services Director, Reneé Welch Vice President Marketing and Membership, Rosemary Linder Day Competitive Swim Team & HR Administrator, Sarah Gulbin Senior Program Director, Shannon Bujoreanu Chief Financial Officer, Robert Marzan Early Childhood Learning Center Program Specialist & I-SWAP Manager, Cynthia Rodriguez Message * CAPTCHA Phone This field is for validation purposes and should be left unchanged. Δ Close Lakeland Hills Family YMCA 100 Fanny Road Mountain Lakes, NJ Phone: 973-334-2820 membership@lhymca.com Frequently Asked Questions What are your facility hours? Our hours are: Monday – Friday 5:00 A.M – 10:30 P.M. Saturday – Sunday 7:00 A.M. – 6:00 P.M. Directions Can I access other YMCA’s with my Lakeland Hills YMCA membership? Yes. We are proud to offer our members access to YMCA facilities across the United States and Canada that participate in Nationwide Membership. This way, our members can use the Y as often as they like, making it easier to achieve their health and wellness goals. Are group exercise classes available? Yes. We have over 65 weekly classes offered from Yoga to HIT. These classes offer a great workout in a class setting, and are all included with your membership. Can I bring a friend? Yes. As a member, you are given 3 guest passes per year. You can bring a friend up to 3X for free. After that there is a fee. Guests/friends can use facility a max of 3X per year and then must become a member. Is there a trial membership to try out the Y? Yes. We have a 1-Week Trial Membership for free.  After that, we have several options that you can choose as a new member. What benefits do I get with my membership? Full Privilege Membership entitles you to use the pool, basketball gymnasium, Health and Fitness Training Center, general membership locker rooms, as well as group fitness, yoga, spinning classes, and all aqua exercise classes. Plus, three free guest passes per year and a fitness orientation. Some age restrictions apply. Long Term Locker Membership offers full privilege membership plus an assigned locker and towel service in an adult only locker room which includes steam room, sauna and TV. What are the pool hours? For Pool Hours and available swim times, please visit our schedules page where you can download swim times as well as gymnasium and group fitness class times. Do you offer financial assistance? Yes. We offer financial aid to ensure that no one is turned away from a Y program or service due to an inability to pay. Visit our Financial Assistance page for more information. STAY CURIOUS Want to know more about how you can make an impact in the community? Fill out this simple form to learn how to get involved. About Us Join Give Volunteer Test Contact Leadership Team Register Privacy Policy Member Login Facility Hours Y Hours Mon-Fri: 5:00am-10:15pm Sat-Sun: 7:00am – 5:45pm Desk Hours Mon-Fri: 8:00am-8:00pm Sat-Sun: 8:00am – 4:00pm Learn more >> CONNECT WITH US Copyright © Lakeland Hills YMCA Lakeland Hills YMCA | 100 Fanny Road | Mountain Lakes, NJ 07046 | 973.334.2820 Site designed by Daxko Toggle Sliding Bar Area Page load link Both Tai Chi classes will be cancelled Thursday, September 11. Last chance this week to register for fall classes, which begin Monday, September 8. Registration available 24/7 online. + +

Our Team - Harbour Club Member Login Home Menu Home Home Our Story Activities Directions & Hours Calendar Our Team Dress Code Work at Our Club Take a tour of the Club and see what you can enjoy. Set Up a Tour INTERESTED IN MEMBERSHIP Grace Swink Membership Director 843.823.0523 Our Team Jim Coyne Role: General Manager / Partner at BNG Hospitality Serving Since: 2018 Phone Number: 843.723.9680 Email Jim Coyne Jim has a business degree from UCF in Orlando Florida and has an extensive 30 year leadership career within the Private Club industry having worked at some of the most exclusive private club’s in the US both on the west and east coast. Jim has held the title of GM in both City and Golf and Country clubs and has extensive experience in all aspects of club management and leadership. David Buganski Role: Assistant General Manager Serving Since: 2018 Phone Number: 843.823.0531 Email David Buganski David joined the Harbour Club team in January 2018. His primary focus is bringing first-rate service to all members, guests, and private events. He stresses friendliness, product knowledge, systems and procedures. David brings over 20 years of hospitality and food & beverage experience. He moved to South Carolina in 2000 after graduating from The University of Toledo with a degree in Business Administration. Small Business has been a main focus both in degree and experience. Some highlights of experience are co-founding/operating a vacation rental property business on Daufuskie Island and spending 10 years as General Manager of a local busy family restaurant. David is committed to finding great people to add to the service team and deliver above and beyond results for Harbour Club. When David is not providing service at Harbour Club, he is likely enjoying time with his wife and young family. Grace Swink Role: Director of Membership Serving Since: 2024 Phone Number: 843.823.0169 Email Grace Swink Grace Swink joined the Harbour Club team as a Receptionist in 2020 when the Club opened its new location. She later was rehired as a Membership Assistant in 2021. Since then, Grace has been promoted to Member Relations and Marketing. She is an East Carolina University graduate and grew up in Raleigh, North Carolina. Grace’s favorite part about working at Harbour Club is building relationships with Members. Megan Yenzer Role: Member Relations Director Serving Since: 2024 Phone Number: 843.823.0169 Email Megan Yenzer Megan Yenzer joined the Harbour Club team in 2024 as Member Relations Director. She was raised in St. Louis, Missouri and attended The University of Mississippi where she earned her Bachelor of Science in Integrated Marketing Communications in 2022. When she is not at the Harbour Club, you can find her outdoors and exploring the beautiful city of Charleston. Juan Acevedo Role: Executive Chef Serving Since: 2023 Phone Number: 843.823.0532 Email Juan Acevedo Chef Juan was Born in Rochester, New York, and raised in Florida. Chef is a Le Cordon Bleu Orlando graduate. He started his career with an internship at Disney World's Magic Kingdom Castle, and he then opened Legoland Florida and Streamsong Golf Resort. He was the Sous Chef of Disney Springs Portobello, an Executive Chef for Sage Dining Services, an Executive Sous Chef for Jekyll Island Resort in Georgia, and most recently an Executive Sous Chef at Wyndham Grand in downtown Pittsburgh. When Chef Juan is not cooking, he is running half and full marathons and spending time with his seven children. Chef is excited to be able to bring his experience to the Harbour Club and be a part of creating successful systems, standards, and culture. Selene Rui Role: Club Accountant Serving Since: 2019 Phone Number: 843.823.0529 Email Selene Rui Selene Rui was born and raised in Torino, Italy. She studied hotel management and languages and left Italy after graduating from college to experience the “full immersion” of different idioms and cultures. Her goal was to live in each country for 12 to 18 months, learning the language, cultural uses, and costumes of many places. After living in different parts of Europe, she decided to venture out to the United States for an 18-month contract. 18 months became 18 years, during which she gained American citizenship through naturalization, a stable job, and a house. She still needs her “Italy fix”; she visits the country and culture that shaped her, including her family and friends. She went back to school in the United States and got into accounting as math and numbers are not opinion-based. She sees her future still in accounting and HR. When she’s not at work she can be found mingling in the gym, busy with outside activities or dancing to Latin music. Candice Halsey Role: Director of Private Events Serving Since: 2022 Phone Number: 843.823.0528 Email Candice Halsey Candice Halsey joined the Harbour Club team in February 2022 as the Director of Private Events. She was raised in North Carolina and attended Johnson & Wales, where she earned her bachelor’s degree in Sports & Event Management. For the next six years she worked for the NFL’s Carolina Panthers in Charlotte, NC. Coastal living was calling, and Candice moved to Charleston in 2016. Candice has always enjoyed planning and executing a vast array of events, most recently being weddings. Candice is excited to bring her experience to the Members and their guests of the Harbour Club and continue to go the extra mile and exceed their expectations. When she’s not planning the Club’s elaborate events, Candice is likely enjoying the beach with her son and attending music or sporting events. © All Rights Reserved. Member Login

About Us | Harbor Hills 740-928-3596 harborhillscc@columbus.rr.com Facebook Facebook Home About Us About Us Board Of Directors Get Involved News Golf Course Course Info Rates Scorecard Course Photos Online Tee Times Membership Membership Promotions Rules & Regulations GHIN membership Shareholder Events Outings Leagues Banquet Room Event Calendar Contact Us Contact Directions Online Tee Times Select Page About Us Welcome to Harbor Hills Country Club Harbor Hills Country Club is a 9 hole semi-private golf course located on the north shore of Buckeye Lake that opened in 1925. We are proud that we are the topped ranked 9 hole golf course in Ohio! Harbor Hills Country Club offers a private banquet hall to meet the needs of a golf outing as well as for special and formal events. Your guests will enjoy a warm and spacious room with hardwood floors and a large stone gas fireplace. Our covered porch directly off the room provides a beautiful view of the community and a glimpse of Buckeye Lake. Harbor Hills Country Club provides in-house catering through our partners at Boland Entertainment. Whether you’re planning a company golf outing or a charity fundraiser, we pride ourselves on delivering flawlessly-executed outings. Our spectacular golf course and friendly service allow you to relax and enjoy the event while we take care of all the details. From tee to green, you’ll experience a well-kept golf course with manicured greens. Book Tee Times Online Directions from Columbus Take 70 E to Exit 129B Merge onto OH-79 N/Hebron Rd toward Newark. Take the US-40 ramp toward Hebron/Zanesville/I-70 ALT W. Turn right onto E main ST/US 40E. Turn right onto Mill Dam Rd SE/CR 489. Turn Left onto Christland Hill Rd SE/CR 596. Turn right onto Freeman Memorial Dr. SE. half mile on left is HHCC. Announcement Scroller Ohio Golf Guide\'s Rated #1 9 Hole Course in Ohio        Ohio Golf Guide\'s #1 Played 9 Hole Course in Ohio Directions from Zanesville Take 70 W to Exit 132, OH-13 Thornville/Newark. Turn left onto Jacksontown RD SE/OH-13. Turn right onto Christland Hill Rd SE/CR 596. Continue to follow CR-596. Turn Left onto Freeman Memorial Dr. SE. half mile on left HHCC. Address Harbor Hills Country Club 225 Freeman Memorial Dr. Hebron, Ohio 43025 Contact Us Phone: (740) 928-3596 E-Mail: harborhillscc@Columbus.rr.com Facebook Powered by ForeUP

About Harbor Hills | Explore, Connect, Enjoy Today — Harbor Hills Country Club Skip to Content Open Menu Close Menu Gift Cards Homes View Models Quick Move Ins Featured Promotions Harbor Hills Resales Custom Homes Why You Should Buy a New Home Features Live Green Keys to Building a Better Home 4 Car Garage Club Book a Tee Time Club Amenities Membership Services Golf Tennis & Pickleball Weddings Gift Cards News Blog News & Events Calendar Videos Contact Contact Us Location Map About Harbor Hills Community Service Reviews Videos 1 0 0 Gift Cards Homes View Models Quick Move Ins Featured Promotions Harbor Hills Resales Custom Homes Why You Should Buy a New Home Features Live Green Keys to Building a Better Home 4 Car Garage Club Book a Tee Time Club Amenities Membership Services Golf Tennis & Pickleball Weddings Gift Cards News Blog News & Events Calendar Videos Contact Contact Us Location Map About Harbor Hills Community Service Reviews Videos 1 0 0 Open Menu Close Menu Gift Cards Folder: Homes Back View Models Quick Move Ins Featured Promotions Harbor Hills Resales Custom Homes Why You Should Buy a New Home Features Live Green Keys to Building a Better Home 4 Car Garage Folder: Club Back Book a Tee Time Club Amenities Membership Services Golf Tennis & Pickleball Weddings Gift Cards Folder: News Back Blog News & Events Calendar Videos Folder: Contact Back Contact Us Location Map About Harbor Hills Community Service Reviews Videos 1 A great community allows its homeowners to feel a sense of privacy, security, and serenity, while providing a place to socialize, interact and celebrate life. A great Club greets each member with a smile as if they are family, while paying close attention to their needs through personalized service. A great home mirrors the homeowner’s personality, down to even the most intricate details that make us who we are. Our Harbor Hills family values these ideals down to its core and it's evident in everything we do. WHAT MAKES HARBOR HILLS GREAT Building upon our industry leading Florida Home Building experience, our team of dedicated professionals have collectively built tens of thousands of New Florida Homes and now culminate in the homes that we build for you at Harbor Hills. It's Our Life's Work and we are passionate about what we do. Harbor Hills is family owned and operated and is backed by one of the nations's most prestigious institutions.  On any given day, family members and our extended Harbor Hills family are onsite and available to serve you. IT IS WHO WE ARE We invite you to explore our web site and learn about our one of a kind community.  Be sure to subscribe to our YouTube Channel and explore our facebook page . We are especially proud of the tremendous impact that our Club has on our surrounding community and are pleased to report that in 2014 the club and affiliated organizations donated approximately $100,000 to various community charities.  Please take a look at our community service page for more information. Of course there is no better way to experience Harbor Hills than to be our guest and visit us.  Call (352) 753-7000 or email us to inquire about our Get Away and Play program. We look forward to seeing you at the Harbor Hills Country Club and sharing our Life's Work with you. AN INVITATION TO YOU Do you have questions or require assistance? A team member is standing by to assist you. CONTACT US About Us Central Florida's premiere custom home builder and country club community. Read More... Youth Golf Lessons Galleri Classic Amenities Dining Racquet Sports Wellness Spa Croquet Champions Club Villas Membership XLife Benefits Host An Event Event Rooms Contact Us Real Estate Resources Calendar Opens in new tab Newsletter Opens in new tab Member Login Opens in new tab Careers Home Who We Are Skip Image Carousel Our Team Calendar Directions & Hours Our History Mission Hills Country Club: A Legacy of Excellence in Coachella Valley Where History, Community, and Innovation Unite For decades, Mission Hills Country Club has set the standard for luxury and leisure in Rancho Mirage, CA. Known for its iconic golf courses, world-class racquet sports facilities, and vibrant community, Mission Hills is more than just a country club—it’s a place where generations come together to play, connect, and make memories in the heart of the Coachella Valley. Shaping Legends in the Coachella Valley Since its founding in 1971, Mission Hills Country Club has been a hub for connection and camaraderie. The Dinah Shore Tournament Course, opened in 1972, brought international acclaim and cemented the club’s reputation as a premier golf destination in the Coachella Valley. Hosting the LPGA major now known as The Chevron Championship, Mission Hills has long been a breeding ground for champions, a legacy proudly upheld by its Members. Explore Our Timeline A Premier Lifestyle in Rancho Mirage Mission Hills Country Club offers a luxurious lifestyle, with 54 holes of championship golf and world-class racquet sports facilities, including 43 courts. The club hosts prestigious events like the PGA Champions Galleri Classic and PPA Tour The Masters, providing ample opportunities for competition and improvement. Members also enjoy a resort-style pool, spa, and exceptional dining, making it the ultimate destination for leisure and community in Rancho Mirage. Continuing Our Legacy in the Desert Mission Hills remains dedicated to evolving while honoring the heritage that established its status as a Coachella Valley icon. We’re enhancing amenities and introducing new experiences to ensure Members enjoy nothing less than excellence. Our vision is to be the premier destination for those seeking a premium lifestyle, where tradition and innovation seamlessly blend, positioning Mission Hills at the forefront of luxury country clubs in the Coachella Valley for generations to come. Explore Membership Dan Hewitson SVP & Managing Director Contact Me 760-883-5322 Contact Me About Dan + Close Dan Hewitson information modal Dan Hewitson SVP & Managing Director Serving since 2007 760-883-5322 Dan.Hewitson 760-883-5322 Dan.Hewitson Contact Me About Dan Dan comes to Mission Hills from his previous role as Regional Operations Managing Director for 18 clubs within the Pacific region of Invited. This is such a special opportunity and he is thrilled with the ability to dedicate his focus to our Clubs in the desert and deliver a premier club experience at Mission Hills our Members can all be proud of.  Dan has lived in the Palm Desert area for more than 15 years and raised his five children here. Like you, he considers the desert his home and Mission Hills a very special place.
